mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sharetask_reply (rno, bno, replytext, replyer, empno) values (tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{empno})
mapper.update: update tbl_sharetask_reply set replytext=#{replytext}, regdate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from tbl_sharetask_reply where bno=#{bno}
